mapper.sql: ID, DEPARTMENT_NAME, DEPARTMENT_DESC, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, DELETED, CAEATOR
mapper.select:
select
from ea_admin_department where DELETED = '0'
and DEPARTMENT_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{departmentName}),'%')
limit #{rowStart}, #{rowEnd}

select count(*) from ea_admin_department where DELETED = '0'
and DEPARTMENT_NAME like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{departmentName}),'%')
mapper.insert: insert into ea_admin_department (ID, DEPARTMENT_NAME, DEPARTMENT_DESC, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, DELETED, CAEATOR) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{caeator,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into ea_admin_department
ID,
DEPARTMENT_NAME,
DEPARTMENT_DESC,
CREATE_TIME,
UPDATE_TIME,
DELETED,
CAEATOR,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{departmentDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

mapper.update:
update ea_admin_department
DEPARTMENT_NAME = #{departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPARTMENT_DESC = #{departmentDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=CHAR},
CAEATOR = #{caeator,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update ea_admin_department set DEPARTMENT_NAME = #{departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPARTMENT_DESC = #{departmentDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, CAEATOR = #{caeator,jdbcType=BIGINT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
